TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StackTrace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示堆疊追蹤，這是一個或多個堆疊框架的已排序集合。

span.span: Represents a stack trace, which is an ordered collection of one or more stack frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用偵錯組建組態的資訊最多資訊。 information will be most informative with Debug build configurations. 根據預設，偵錯組建會包含偵錯符號，而發行組建則否。By default, Debug builds include debug symbols, while Release builds do not. 偵錯符號包含大部分的檔案、 方法名稱、 行號和資料行資訊用來建構和物件。The debug symbols contain most of the file, method name, line number, and column information used in constructing and objects. 可能不會報告如預期般運作，因為發生在最佳化期間的程式碼轉換的多個方法呼叫。 might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何建立簡單並逐一查看其框架，以取得偵錯和診斷資訊。The following console application demonstrates how to create a simple and iterate through its frames to obtain debugging and diagnostic information. [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/CPP/stacktracesample1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/CS/stacktracesample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/VB/stacktracesample1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 針對存取 unmanaged 程式碼繼承者的能力。

span.span: for the ability of inheritors to access unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 從呼叫端的框架來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the caller's frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會透過呼叫端的目前的執行緒，而且不包含檔案名稱、 行號或資料行資訊。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 當您想要完整追蹤與只有摘要方法的呼叫堆疊相關的資訊，請使用此預設建構函式。Use this default constructor when you want a complete trace with only summary method information about the call stack. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示堆疊追蹤中的第一個和最後一個函式呼叫。The following code example displays the first and last function calls in a stack trace. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#8)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the caller's frame, optionally capturing source information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立與呼叫端的目前執行緒。The is created with the caller's current thread. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範各種建構函式方法。The following code example demonstrates various constructor methods. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#4)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains a single frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不想讓完整堆疊追蹤的額外負荷，請使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor when you do not want the overhead of a full stack trace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將堆疊追蹤資訊的事件記錄檔項目。The following code example writes stack trace information to an event log entry. [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CPP/stacktracesample3.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CS/stacktracesample3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/VB/stacktracesample3.vb#6)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided exception object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會透過呼叫端的目前的執行緒，而且不包含檔案名稱、 行號或資料行資訊。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 結果的堆疊追蹤會說明堆疊在例外狀況的時間。The resulting stack trace describes the stack at the time of the exception.

span.span: The parameter is .

param.span: 要開始追蹤的堆疊上的框架數。

summary.span: 從呼叫端的框架初始化 類別的新執行個體，略過指定的框架數。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the caller's frame, skipping the specified number of frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會透過呼叫端的目前的執行緒，而且不包含檔案名稱、 行號或資料行資訊。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 如果要略過的框架數目大於或等於呼叫堆疊上的框架總數將會建立執行個體，會包含任何框架。If the number of frames to skip is greater than or equal to the total number of frames on the call stack at the time the instance is created, the will contain no frames.

span.span: The parameter is negative.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包含檔案名稱、 行號或資料行資訊。The does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 結果的堆疊追蹤會說明堆疊在例外狀況的時間。The resulting stack trace describes the stack at the time of the exception. 如果要略過的框架數目大於或等於呼叫堆疊上的框架總數將會建立執行個體，會包含任何框架。If the number of frames to skip is greater than or equal to the total number of frames on the call stack at the time the instance is created, the will contain no frames.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specific thread, optionally capturing source information.

summary.span: 不要使用這個建構函式多載。

span.span: Do not use this constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿使用這個建構函式。Do not use this constructor. 已經過時，而且沒有任何建議的替代做法。It is obsolete, and there is no recommended alternative. 當您暫停執行緒時，您會有沒有辦法知道哪些程式碼，它會執行和死結是很容易發生。When you suspend a thread, you have no way of knowing what code it is executing, and deadlocks can occur very easily. 比方說，如果您暫停執行緒，雖然它會保持鎖定，安全性權限評估期間，其他執行緒在可能會遭到封鎖。For example, if you suspend a thread while it holds locks during a security permission evaluation, other threads in the might be blocked. 如果您暫停執行緒，當它執行時的類別建構函式，其他執行緒在，嘗試使用封鎖的類別。If you suspend a thread while it is executing a class constructor, other threads in the that attempt to use that class are blocked.

span.span: The thread is not suspended.

The specified stack frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 堆疊框架的編號從 0，這是發送的最後一個堆疊框架。Stack frames are numbered starting at 0, which is the last stack frame pushed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示堆疊追蹤中的第一個和最後一個函式呼叫。The following code example displays the first and last function calls in a stack trace. summary.span: 傳回目前堆疊追蹤內的所有堆疊框架的複本。

span.span: Returns a copy of all stack frames in the current stack trace.

returns.span: 型別的陣列，表示堆疊追蹤中的函式呼叫。

span.span: An array of type representing the function calls in the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用傳回陣列來列舉及檢查函式呼叫中。Use the returned array to enumerate and examine function calls in the . 傳回陣列的長度等於屬性值。The length of the returned array is equal to the property value. 陣列項目是以反向時間順序。The array elements are in reverse chronological order. 陣列索引為 0 表示最新的函式呼叫堆疊追蹤和推送至呼叫堆疊的最後一個框架中。The at array index 0 represents the most recent function call in the stack trace and the last frame pushed onto the call stack. 的陣列索引處減 1 代表最舊的函式呼叫堆疊追蹤和推送至呼叫堆疊的第一個畫面中。The at array index minus 1 represents the oldest function call in the stack trace and the first frame pushed onto the call stack. 使用 方法，以取得所有的堆疊框架的堆疊追蹤，使用方法，以取得特定的堆疊框架的堆疊追蹤中。Use the method to obtain all stack frames in a stack trace; use the method to obtain a specific stack frame in a stack trace. 依兩種方法很類似排序的索引。The indexes are ordered alike by the two methods. 例如，所傳回的陣列中的索引 0 處相當於所傳回輸入索引為 0。For example, the at index 0 in the array returned by is equivalent to the returned by with an input index of 0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何列舉中的框架。The following code example demonstrates enumerating the frames in a . [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/CPP/stacktracesample2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/CS/stacktracesample2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/VB/stacktracesample2.vb#3)]

summary.span: 定義要從堆疊追蹤省略的方法數預設值。

span.span: Defines the default for the number of methods to omit from the stack trace.
This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要略過的堆疊追蹤開頭的方法數預設值。The default value for the number of methods to skip at the beginning of the stack trace. 這個常數的值為 0。The value of this constant is 0.
